name: Real Mahjong Adventure: Umi e Summer Waltz
overview: Real Mahjong Adventure "Umi-He": Summer Waltz (リアル麻雀アドベンチャー 海へ Summer Waltz) is an adventure game developed and published by Seta for the Sega Saturn. It is an adventure game based on the Super Real Mahjong series characters. The limited edition version of the game comes with an audio CD.
